title: Indian Cinema stars and Sri Lankan cricketers bat for Videocon IIFA Weekend
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma Charity Initiative: ‘Cricket for Children’ launched with Sri Lanka Cricket and UNICEF Cementing its commitment to building bridges between countries, IIFA 2010 will host a special charity cricket spectacular as part of the Videocon IIFA Weekend in Colombo, Sri Lanka. The ‘Cricket for Children’ event, the IIFA Foundation Celebrity…
